Villager.name: Villager
Villager.short: Find the Werewolves and vote them out.
Villager.long: You have no special night abilities. Your strength lies in your vote and your deduction skills. Listen to the others, find the inconsistencies, and lynch the beasts.

night.feedback: You made an interesting choice, picking {target}. You are now dreaming of yummy pupusas while the night creatures are stirring ...

Werewolf.name: Werewolf
Werewolf.short: Kill Villagers at night. Don't get caught.
Werewolf.long: You are part of the pack. Every night, you wake up with the other Werewolves and must agree unanimously on a victim to kill. During the day, you must colloborate with the other Werwolves while still acting like an innocent Villager to avoid being caught.

Seer.name: Seer
Seer.short: See a player's role at night! (Werewolf?)
Seer.long: You are the village's most powerful investigator. Every night, you select one player to reveal that player's team - werewolves or villagers. Note the Monster is seen as a Werewolf.

night.prompt: Seer, whose role will you see?

Alpha_Werewolf.name: Alpha Werewolf
Alpha_Werewolf.short: Solo wins if last one standing.
Alpha_Werewolf.long: You are the leader of the Werewolves. You vote with the pack to kill at night. However, your goal is to sit alone on your mountain. Solo win if only living werewolf with maximum of one living non-Monster.

Bodyguard.name: Bodyguard
Bodyguard.short: Chooses a player to protect from Werewolves.
Bodyguard.long: Every night, you may choose one player to guard. If the Werewolves attack that player, your protection saves them, and nobody dies. You cannot protect the same person two nights in a row.

Cupid.name: Cupid
Cupid.short: Link two players in fatal love.
Cupid.long: On your first night, choose two players to be 'Lovers.' These two learn their lover name. Their fates are linked: if one is killed (at night or by lynching), the other dies immediately of a broken heart.

night.description: The selected players are fatally in love. If one dies, the other dies of heartache.

Demented_Villager.name: Demented Villager
Demented_Villager.short: Solo wins if last one standing.
Demented_Villager.long: You have no special powers and appear as a Villager to the Seer. However, ChatGPT convinced you to kill everyone for the WIN. Note you won't be last if left with a Monster, Honeypot, Hunter, Serial Killer, or Wild Child.

night.feedback: You made an interesting choice, picking {target}.

Fool.name: Fool
Fool.short: Tries to get themselves lynched by the village.
Fool.long: You are a neutral chaos agent. You are not part of the villagers nor the werewolves. Although your ultimate win is successful if you convince the town to Lynch you.

night.feedback: You made an interesting choice, picking {target}.

Honeypot.name: Honeypot
Honeypot.short: A trap role. If killed, their killer dies too.
Honeypot.long: You are a Villager, but dangerous to touch. If you are killed, whether by Werewolves or a Lynch mob ‚Äî they will pay with their life.

night.feedback: You made an interesting choice, picking {target}.

Hunter.name: Hunter
Hunter.short: Can strike another player with last dying breath.
Hunter.long: During the night you may select someone to kill upon your death.

night.prompt: Hunter: Who will you shoot IF you die?
night.feedback: You are aiming at {target} (only fires if you die).

Backlash_Werewolf.name: Backlash Werewolf
Backlash_Werewolf.short: Can strike another player with last dying breath.
Backlash_Werewolf.long: You are a Werewolf with deathly reflexes. You may choose a player at Night to avenge upon your death.

night.description:
1. Vote for the Night Kill (Pack Action)
2. Select a Grudge Target (Dies if you die)
night.feedback: You voted to kill {target} and marked {target2} for backlash.

Lawyer.name: Lawyer
Lawyer.short: Chooses a client to be unlynchable the next day.
Lawyer.long: You work to defend the accused. At night, you select a player to be your client. If that player goes to lynch trial, the lynching will fail, and they will survive.

night.prompt: Lawyer, who will you defend in this monkey court?
night.feedback: You are preparing a defense for {target}.

Martyr.name: Martyr
Martyr.short: Gifts a player a 2nd life upon their death.
Martyr.long: At night you can select a player to absorb your life force upon your death.

night.prompt: Martyr, Who will you bestow a 2nd Life upon your death?

Mayor.name: Mayor
Mayor.short: Vote can break a tie during accusations.
Mayor.long: You are the leader of the village. Because of your political influence, your vote carries tie-breaking weight during the daily accusation. You can secretly announce your successor. Your successor can only name their successor if their role has no night actions, like a Villager or Monster.

night.prompt: Mayor, who will be the next mayor?

Monster.name: Monster
Monster.short: Solo wins if last one standing. Teamless
Monster.long: You are a supernatural beast. You are not on the Villager team or the Werewolf team; you are on your own. You are immune to the Werewolf attacks and are seen as a Werewolf. Solo win if alive with maximum of one living Werewolf.

night.feedback: You made an interesting choice, picking {target}.

Prostitute.name: Prostitute
Prostitute.short: Visit a player at night and block their night actions.
Prostitute.long: Each night, you can visit another player. The visiting player's night selection is secretly cancelled. If you or the visiting player is killed, you both die. Visit most of the players for a solo win!

Random_Seer.name: Random Seer
Random_Seer.short: Has secret attribute: sane, paranoid, naive, insane
Random_Seer.long: 25% sane normal, 25% paranoid (see werewolves everywhere), 25% naive (sees only villagers), 25% insane (sees opposite role). Should be played with normal Seer. Seer mental state is a secret attribute.

night.prompt: Seer, whose role will you see?

Revealer.name: Revealer
Revealer.short: Reveal a player's role? Reveal: Wolf- Wolf dies; Villager- You die.
Revealer.long: You have a high-stakes power. You choose a player to 'Reveal.' If they are a Werewolf, they are exposed and killed immediately. If they are a Villager, you die of shame for accusing an innocent.

night.prompt: Revealer: Expose a wolf. If you're wrong, you dieüíÄ

Serial_Killer.name: Serial Killer
Serial_Killer.short: Kills one person nightly. Wins if last one standing.
Serial_Killer.long: You are a third party. You do not win with the Villagers or the Werewolves. Every night, you choose a victim to mutilate. Your kills cannot be stopped by the Bodyguard. You can only solo win with maximum of one other living human.

night.prompt: Serial Killer, Who is your next victim?

Sorcerer.name: Sorcerer
Sorcerer.short: Team Werewolf. Search for other magic roles.
Sorcerer.long: You are on the Werewolf team but do not wake up with them to kill. Instead, you investigate players to identify who the Seer is or other magic users like the Witch and the Revealer.

night.prompt: Sorcerer, find the Seer or Witch!
night.feedback: You gazed into the void and saw {target} role.

Tough_Villager.name: Tough Villager
Tough_Villager.short: Villager who can survive one death.
Tough_Villager.long: You have no active powers, but you are wearing armor. The first time you die, you will mysteriously survive. You only really die upon your second death.

night.feedback: You made an interesting choice, picking {target}.

Tough_Werewolf.name: Tough Werewolf
Tough_Werewolf.short: Will survive the first attempt on their life.
Tough_Werewolf.long: You hunt with the pack. If a Hunter shoots you, a Witch poisons you, Lynch-mob targets you, or the Serial Killer attacks you, you survive that first strike.

Wild_Child.name: Wild Child
Wild_Child.short: Picks a role model. If they die, child becomes a Werewolf.
Wild_Child.long: On the first night, you choose another player to be your 'Role Model.' As long as they live, and nurture you, you stay human. If they die, you become a Werewolf and join the pack.

Witch.name: Witch
Witch.short: Has two potions: one to kill, one to heal.
Witch.long: You wake up before the Werewolves. You can use your Healing Potion to possibly save the victim if you guess right, or your Poison Potion to kill another player of your choice. You can use each potion only once per game.

night.prompt: Witch, who will consume a potion?
